english.segment1: The night bleeds day, with every breath I take. reality brings, bright eyes, smooth skin.
english.segment2: So what is left from this, a bottle of broken self. In a moment itll all be gone, til the next time when it all comes back.
english.segment3: Come on, feed a lie, watch the birth, kiss the dirt. kiss it.
english.segment4: Next time has come and gone, what will bring the end, a promise thrown into the night, or a little reminder.
english.segment5: So what is left from this, a bottle of broken self. In a moment itll all be gone, til the next time when it all comes back.
english.segment6: feed a lie, watch the birth, kiss the dirt. kiss it.
english.segment7: Searching through these pieces, looking for your shadow. Getting closer all the time.
english.segment8: Countless words, in a sea of explanation, flailing to grasp, a rock (to stand).
english.segment10: Searching through these pieces, looking for your shadow. Getting closer all the time.
english.segment11: feed a lie, watch the birth. kiss the dirt.
